sentence: Israel's  bombardment  of  Gaza  has  killed  more  than  26,000  people  —  approximately  1%  of  the  prewar  population  —  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry.
Israel's  offensive  is  in  response  to  the  Oct.  7  Hamas  attack  on  Israel,  in  which  1,200  people  were  killed  and  more  than  240  taken  hostage,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
